Hi

My entity beans transactions are defined as "required"

How can I test something that spans multiple transactions?

If I do it from junit as an ejb client, then I cant access my entity beans since they have only local interfaces.

If I do it from ejbunit, then ejbunit runs in the container and therefore runs in the same transaction...
